bill.constitutionalAuthorityStatementText: [Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 59 (Monday, April 4, 2022)][House]From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]By Ms. NORTON:H.R. 7386.Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuantto the following:clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.[Page H4153]

item.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E351)

summary.text:
Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act

This bill increases from 5 to 15 the number of individuals from the District of Columbia who may be appointed to the U.S. Military Academy, U.S. Naval Academy, and U.S. Air Force Academy.

bill.title: Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act

item.title: Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act
Service Academies District of Columbia Equality Act
To amend title 10, United States Code, to increase the number of individuals from the District of Columbia who may be appointed to military service academies.

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.
dublinCore.dc:contributor: Congressional Research Service, Library of Congress
dublinCore.dc:description: This file contains bill summaries and statuses for federal legislation. A bill summary describes the most significant provisions of a piece of legislation and details the effects the legislative text may have on current law and federal programs. Bill summaries are authored by the Congressional Research Service (CRS) of the Library of Congress. As stated in Public Law 91-510 (2 USC 166 (d)(6)), one of the duties of CRS is "to prepare summaries and digests of bills and resolutions of a public general nature introduced in the Senate or House of Representatives". For more information, refer to the User Guide that accompanies this file.
